subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Women and Girls
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Marianne Vos won the inaugural La Course by Le Tour de France, which came about through an online campaign. The hope is that it helps revive the women’s version of the Tour.
snippet: Marianne Vos won the inaugural La Course by Le Tour de France, which came about through an online campaign. The hope is that it helps revive the women’s version of the Tour.
